Package com.virosms.ejercicio02

Class ViewPagerAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentViewHolder>
androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentStateAdapter
com.virosms.ejercicio02.ViewPagerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
androidx.viewpager2.adapter.StatefulAdapter
public class ViewPagerAdapter extends androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentStateAdapter
ViewPagerAdapter es una subclase de FragmentStateAdapter que proporciona las vistas de fragmento para un ViewPager2.
Since:
2024-02-05
Version:
1.0
Author:
charles
